Welcome to ``cookiecutter_pyproject_demo`` Documentation
==============================================================================
.. image:: https://cookiecutter-pyproject-demo.readthedocs.io/en/latest/_static/cookiecutter_pyproject_demo-logo.png
    :target: https://cookiecutter-pyproject-demo.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

Documentation for ``cookiecutter_pyproject_demo``.


.. _install:

Install
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``cookiecutter_pyproject_demo`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is to:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install cookiecutter-pyproject-demo

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install --upgrade cookiecutter-pyproject-demo
